name: Markdown Journal Rust
description: High-performance semantic search engine for markdown journals with RAG system
highlights: Built semantic search achieving <20ms query times
Implemented RAG system using LanceDB and BGE embeddings
Rust workspace with multiple crates for search and frontmatter analysis
Claude Code integration for AI-powered journaling

name: Trackwatch
description: Terminal music visualizer built with Rust
highlights: Real-time audio processing and spectrum analysis
Cross-platform terminal UI with responsive design
